title: Twitter deletes tracking data in 10 days and offers an opt-out

tosdr.case: tracking data deleted after 10 days and opt-out
tosdr.tldr: Twitter widgets on third-party websites collect data about you. The data is kept a maximum of 10 days. Also, you can opt-out completely by enabling “Do-Not-Track”. See how.
